The Nature of Haxe
“Loops”

by Christopher Butler

The fifth in the series of The Nature of Haxe and OpenFL videos based on the book The Nature of Code written by Daniel Shiffman originally using Processing. Christopher takes you through programming strategies and techniques behind computer simulations of natural systems using Haxe and OpenFL.

    Prologue

  1. What is The Nature of Code
  2. Variables
  3. Data Types
  4. If Statements
  5. Loops
  6. Functions
  7. Objects
  8. Processing-like Setup

    Introduction

  1. The Random Walker
  2. Uniform Distribution
  3. Non-Uniform Distribution
  4. Normal Distributions
